titleStmt.title: [Jest, o]r, A Pretty iest of a bride and a bridegroome where the bridegroo[m] wa[s] most neately deceiued of his sweet- heart by a seruingman : to the tune of, Better late thriue then neuer.

notesStmt.note: Part of title suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: cropped with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Pepys Library.
